instructions: Open Wallet on your iPhone and tap Apple Card. Tap the more button . Tap Card Information and authenticate with Face ID, Touch ID, or your passcode. Tap Request New Card Number.

Open the Settings app on your iPhone. Scroll down and tap Safari. Under General, tap AutoFill. Tap Saved Credit Cards and authenticate with Face ID, Touch ID, or your passcode. Tap the card that you want to update, then tap Edit.
Open the Wallet app on your iPhone and tap Apple Card. Tap the more button . Under Billing Address, tap your address.

Open the Wallet app on your iPhone and tap Apple Card. Tap the more button . Scroll down to Transactions. Tap Allow Notifications to receive notifications on your Apple Card account. Tap again to turn notifications off.
Open Settings on your iPhone. Tap Notifications, then tap Wallet. Tap Allow Notifications to turn off all notifications.
Open the Wallet app on your iPhone and tap Apple Card. Tap the more button . Scroll down and tap Privacy Policy or Terms and Conditions.
Open the Wallet app on your iPhone and tap Apple Card. Tap the more button . Scroll to Credit Details.
Open Wallet on your iPhone and tap Apple Card. Tap the more button . Then tap the Message button to start chatting with an Apple Card Specialist.
